message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe you'll find it a great addition to your collection. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $680000?

I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable going as low as $680000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this time I'll compromise at $720000. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price for this exceptional product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $720000 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $690000?

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $690000. I'll make one more compromise, and I'll meet you at $700000. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $700000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about $680000?

I'm starting to think we're not on the same page, Bob. I've already compromised multiple times, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $690000. I'll give you one last chance to meet me at this price, but if not, I'll have to consider other options.

Alice, I understand you've compromised a lot, but I'm still not comfortable with $690000. I'm willing to meet you at $680000, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to accept it, I'll have to explore other options.
